subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Tennessee set an American record in the 4x800-meter relay on Saturday to complete a rare triple in the Penn Relays at Franklin Field, finishing in 8 minutes 17.91 seconds. Tennessee is just the third program and sixth women’s team to take the distance medley and the 4x1,500- and 4x800-meter events in the 115-year history of the meet.
